entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:08 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 09:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %

Dewpoint: -5.1°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
